DOC.brief_title: Medtronic Shock-Less Study Physician Utilization Shock Reduction Programming
DOC.detailed_description: Shocks deliver patient defibrillator , life-saving , create anxiety , pain decrease quality life . Previous study show device program feature safely reduce number shock patient receive . This study explore extent physician use program feature . It determine whether repeat frequent awareness program subject program trend enrolled subject change program pattern . This accomplish understanding physician ' device programming behavior provide report tool help physician manage subject provide shock reduction program recommend previous publication .
